summary: This is a template to the 'DIY Custom Banner' making it a Fighters Guild Banner
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is a template for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1678690/][b]galdran[/b][/url]s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70619/?]DIY Custom Banner[/url] mod, making it in to a Fighters Guild Banner.

Install this by extract the file in to \Data\textures\clutter\customsigil

Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70619/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D70619%26preview%3D&pUp=1]DIY Custom Banner[/url]

Have fun :)

[/size]To do:
- Make a HD version
- Make a ESO Fighters Guild version
author: Unicus1
